articles.title: British Steel to get supplies to keep furnaces burning - BBC
articles.description: The government says the Scunthorpe plant will receive raw materials from the US and Australia.
articles.content:
Michael RaceBusiness reporter, BBC News
British Steel's blast furnaces are set to continue running after the government secured delivery of key raw materials. 
Coking coal and iron ore from the US … [+4464 chars]
